entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:33 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.9°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
